column2: In your opinion, inside a home, should smoking…
column18: 2 = Be allowed only at some times
column20: 4 = SMOKING RESTRICTIONS INSIDE A HOME SHOULD BE WHATEVER THE PEOPLE WHO LIVE THERE DECIDE (Note to reader: The interviewer will not read this response. It will only be coded if the respondent volunteers the response.)

column2: At workplaces, do you think smoking indoors should be…?
column18: 2 = Allowed only at some times or in some places

column2: At workplaces, do you think smoking outdoors should be…?
column18: 2 = Allowed only at some times or in some places
2 = Allowed only at some times or in some places

column2: Should smoking indoors in bars, casinos, or clubs…?
column18: 2 = Allowed only at some times or in some places
2 = Allowed only at some times or in some places

column2: Should policies that don’t allow tobacco use in indoor or outdoor public places be strictly enforced?
Would you be in favor of an increase in the tax on a pack of cigarettes if the money were used to improve the public’s health?
Current prices for a pack of cigarettes range from about four to eight dollars. Would you be in favor of an additional tax on a pack of cigarettes of…
column17: 1 = More than two dollars a pack?
column18: 2 = Up to two dollars a pack?
column19: 3 = Up to one dollar a pack?
column20: 4 = Up to fifty cents a pack?

column2: Would you be in favor of an increase in the tax on chewing tobacco, snuff, dip, or snus if the money were used to improve the public’s health?
How important is it to prevent sales of tobacco products to youth under 18…?
Should tobacco use be completely banned on school grounds, including fields and parking lots, and at all school events, even for teachers and other adults?
